entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having a drink and coming back after a fashion. He is also referred to by Malfoy as 'you' in the context of putting the Dark Mark over the Tower.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as deciding to put the Dark Mark over the Tower and getting Dumbledore to hurry up. He also mentions that someone has been killed.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is the one who was supposed to put the Dark Mark over the Tower, but Malfoy took charge of it.
Malfoy got Dumbledore to hurry up by putting the Dark Mark over the Tower.
